RedoxRRI 0.99.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

Holobiont Redox Resilience Index (RRI) with spatio-temporal dynamics

Source: R/RRI_pipeline_st.R
rri_pipeline_st.Rd

This function constructs a holobiont-scale resilience index from three domains:

  1. Physiology (plant oxidative buffering and stress-response traits)

  2. Soil (redox chemistry and stability proxies)

  3. Microbial resilience, optionally blended from:

    • microbial abundance or functional features (micro_data)

    • microbial network organization (graph)

rri_pipeline_st(
  ROS_flux,
  Eh_stability,
  micro_data = NULL,
  graph = NULL,
  id = NULL,
  time_col = NULL,
  group_cols = NULL,
  mode = c("snapshot", "rolling", "event"),
  window = 3,
  align = c("right", "center", "left"),
  event_col = NULL,
  baseline_label = "pre",
  recovery_labels = "recovery",
  alpha_micro = 0.5,
  method_phys = "pca",
  method_soil = "pca",
  method_micro = "pca",
  direction_phys = c("auto", "higher_is_better", "lower_is_better"),
  direction_soil = c("auto", "higher_is_better", "lower_is_better"),
  direction_micro = c("auto", "higher_is_better", "lower_is_better"),
  direction_anchor_phys = NULL,
  direction_anchor_soil = NULL,
  direction_anchor_micro = NULL,
  scale_by = NULL,
  network_agg = c("equation", "mean"),
  w1 = 0.4,
  w2 = 0.35,
  w3 = 0.25,
  add_coupling = FALSE,
  coupling_weight = 0,
  coupling_fun = c("geometric_mean", "agreement"),
  norm_method = NULL
)

Arguments

ROS_flux

Data frame or matrix; samples in rows, physiological traits in columns.

Eh_stability

Data frame or matrix; samples in rows, soil redox variables in columns.

micro_data

Optional data frame or matrix; samples in rows, microbial features in columns.

graph

Optional microbial network input: either a single igraph object (system-level) or a list of igraph objects (one per sample).

id

Optional data frame describing sample identities. If provided, must have nrow(id) == nrow(ROS_flux). Typical columns: plot, depth, plant_id, time.

time_col

Character. Name of time column in id. Required for mode != "snapshot".

group_cols

Character vector. Columns in id defining spatial/experimental units.

mode

One of "snapshot", "rolling", "event".

window

Integer >= 2. Rolling window size for mode = "rolling".

align

Character. Rolling alignment: "right", "center", "left".

event_col

Character. Column in id containing event labels (for mode = "event").

baseline_label

Character. Label defining baseline period.

recovery_labels

Character vector defining recovery periods.

alpha_micro

Numeric in \([0,1]\). Blend weight: $$\mathrm{Micro} = \alpha \cdot \mathrm{abundance} + (1-\alpha) \cdot \mathrm{network}.$$

method_phys, method_soil, method_micro

Latent extraction methods: "pca", "scale", "mean", "fa", "umap", "nmf", "wgcna".

direction_phys, direction_soil, direction_micro

Direction semantics: "higher_is_better", "lower_is_better", "auto".

direction_anchor_phys, direction_anchor_soil, direction_anchor_micro

Optional anchor column names used when corresponding direction is "auto".

scale_by

Character vector of columns in id within which to scale domain scores to \([0,1]\). Defaults to group_cols. Set NULL for global scaling.

network_agg

Aggregation for network metrics: "equation" or "mean".

w1, w2, w3

Nonnegative domain weights that must sum to 1.

add_coupling

Logical. If TRUE, adds a coupling/coherence term among domains.

coupling_weight

Numeric in \([0,1]\). Weight for coupling term; domain weights are renormalized to sum to \(1 - \mathrm{coupling\_weight}\).

coupling_fun

Coupling function: "geometric_mean" or "agreement".

norm_method

Optional legacy override; if supplied, overrides method_*.

Value

An object of class "RRI" (a named list) with:

row_scores

Absolute domain scores and RRI (all scaled to \([0,1]\)).

row_scores_comp

Compositional domain contributions and RRI (Physio + Soil + Micro = 1 when defined).

dyn_scores

Dynamic summaries for rolling/event modes; NULL for snapshot mode.

meta

Settings and system-level mean RRI (rri_index).

Details

Computes a holobiont-level Redox Resilience Index (RRI) by integrating plant physiology, soil redox chemistry, and microbial resilience into a unified, directionally identifiable index with explicit support for spatial and temporal designs.

Returned domain representations

The output includes both:

  • Absolute domain scores (Physio, Soil, Micro) scaled to \([0,1]\).

  • Compositional domain contributions (Physio, Soil, Micro) projected to sum to 1 (ternary-ready).

Direction identifiability

Latent methods (e.g., PCA/FA) have arbitrary sign. When direction_* = "auto", the latent score is flipped (if needed) so that higher latent values align with higher values of the specified anchor variable.

Missing data handling

Robust median imputation is applied within strata (defined by scale_by) before latent extraction. This avoids failures in SVD-based methods and reduces bias under MNAR sensor dropout and redox shocks.

Spatio-temporal modes

"snapshot"

Independent per-sample RRI (default).

"rolling"

Rolling-window dynamic RRI within group_cols ordered by time_col.

"event"

Baseline–pulse–recovery summaries by group using event_col.

Examples

sim <- simulate_redox_holobiont(seed = 1)

res <- rri_pipeline_st(
  ROS_flux = sim$ROS_flux,
  Eh_stability = sim$Eh_stability,
  micro_data = sim$micro_data,
  id = sim$id,
  group_cols = c("plot", "depth"),
  scale_by = c("plot", "depth"),
  direction_phys = "auto",
  direction_anchor_phys = "FvFm",
  direction_soil = "auto",
  direction_anchor_soil = "Eh",
  direction_micro = "higher_is_better"
)

head(res$row_scores)
#>      Physio      Soil     Micro       RRI Micro_abundance Micro_network
#> 1 0.7484599 0.7694774 0.6591048 0.7379097       0.6591048            NA
#> 2 0.5757726 0.5754110 0.6956733 0.6092810       0.6956733            NA
#> 3 0.4422701 0.7724546 0.4346524 0.5592897       0.4346524            NA
#> 4 0.3932364 0.8409692 0.7141923 0.6339901       0.7141923            NA
#> 5 0.9357307 0.6183405 0.7146634 0.7740267       0.7146634            NA
#> 6 0.5331947 0.6986826 0.4478861 0.5732316       0.4478861            NA
head(res$row_scores_comp)
#>      Physio      Soil     Micro       RRI
#> 1 0.3437967 0.3534509 0.3027524 0.7379097
#> 2 0.3117581 0.3115623 0.3766796 0.6092810
#> 3 0.2681437 0.4683311 0.2635252 0.5592897
#> 4 0.2018255 0.4316209 0.3665536 0.6339901
#> 5 0.4124461 0.2725486 0.3150053 0.7740267
#> 6 0.3174225 0.4159411 0.2666364 0.5732316
